ask

public java.util.ArrayList<FormulaAndProbability> ask(Formula formula,
                                                      double threshold,
                                                      int maxResults)
                                               throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException,
                                                      XPCException,
                                                      org.json.JSONException
Quesries the xpce server for the probability of a given formula.

Parameters:
formula - the formula
threshold - the threshold for the probability of desired instances of the given formula (the value should be between 0 and 1)
maxResults - maximum number of instances to be returned
Throws:
org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
XPCException
org.json.JSONException
